select i.*,item.*,(i.inventory_num * item.item_price) total_price,c.cname from inventory i left JOIN item on i.item_id = item.item_id left JOIN category c on c.cid = item.cid
and i.item_name like '%${inv.itemName}%'
order by c.cname,item.item_id
select sum(i.inventory_num * item.item_price) total from inventory i left JOIN item on i.item_id = item.item_id

select i.item_id,i.item_name,inv.inventory_id,inv.item_name,ifnull(SUM(s.stock_num)-SUM(a.apply_num),0) inventory_num from item i left JOIN apply a on i.item_id = a.item_id left JOIN stock s on i.item_id = s.item_id left JOIN inventory inv on i.item_id = inv.item_id group by i.item_id,i.item_name,inv.inventory_id
